entries.name: Living Spirit
entries: You are immune to disease, do not need to eat or drink, and instead of sleeping you enter an inactive state for 4 hours per day during which you are aware of your surroundings.

entries.name: Mystical Awareness
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put you to sleep.

entries.name: Spirit Realm's Refuge
entries: As an action, you can teleport into a small pocket of the Spirit Realm for up to 1 hour; once used, requires three long rests to use again.

entries.name: Malevolent Influence
entries: You have advantage on Intimidation checks and can cast one fear-related spell once per long rest; specific spell decided with DM.

entries.name: Hunger of the Abyss
entries: Once per long rest, when you witness a frightened creature die, you may regain hit points equal to 1d6 + your Charisma modifier.
